column5: Has Bauers closed on Onaman Lake? Can't find a website, facebook not updated this year at all and a google search said "temporarily closed". Anyone know?
Edit- found the web site but its not really working at all
I follow them on facebook and they have almost daily posts so still active, says they've had over 10 post in the past two weeks.
Tried, but I can't find active Facebook page. Has anyone on the Board fished Onaman this year (with or without Bauers)?
https://www.facebook.com/BauersOnama...insAndOutposts Last FB post was July 26, 2022. There is a pinned post above the most recent posts that is dated last year. You need to scroll down past that.
